long_description: Lightweight with just the right amount of coverage and cushioning, the WrightSock Escape Hiking Socks are great for day hikes as well as longer trips in the backcountry. Stretch-polyester and nylon fabric blend is soft against skin and offers a snug fit; double-layer design provides durability without being bulky. Light cushioning offers underfoot comfort while you're on the trail. WrightSock Escape Hiking Socks feature mesh panels on the insteps for enhanced breathability. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Lightweight with just the right amount of coverage and cushioning, the WrightSock Escape Hiking Socks are great for day hikes as well as longer trips in the backcountry.
